title: SQD Model-Based Instructional Design for Technology-Integrated Education Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening technology-integrated instructional design and assessment competencies in blended (face-to-face/online) environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply the five core elements of the SQD model (Reflection, Role Model, Collaboration, Instructional Design, Authentic Experiences) to educational design.
Learners can measure and analyze the effectiveness of technology-integrated education programs using SQD model-based evaluation criteria.
Learners can improve actual lesson scenarios by reflecting on educational design feedback using collaboration tools.

resources: Collaboration Platforms (Google Workspace, MS Teams, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
